description: Khoi Nguyen is a PhD in Computer Science graduating from Oregon State University. His research interests include computer vision and machine learning. His primary research includes 2D/3D understanding, encompassing areas such as detection, segmentation, and reconstruction. In addition, he also explores the realms of Few-shot Learning and Vision-Language Models. Furthermore, Khoi is actively involved in advancing 2D/3D Generation, particularly in Efficient and Trustworthy Generative AI, contributing to push the boundaries of knowledge and innovation.
